name: Kitchen Witchery
description:
A kitchen witch is crafty and clever. Embrace your magic and visualize the path ahead. Collect magical ingredients while navigating the way to your hearth. Shift into the spirit realm to outwit fearsome beasts and bake the perfect pie.

Tasty recipes to assemble and bake
Fresh, juicy produce to collect and protect
Turn-based movement to hone your intuition
Warm, flaky pies infused with prosperity
